name: New Spirited
description:
It's new year's eve. The fireworks are about to start! You can't scare away your bad spirits, but you can grab hold of the good ones!

Thank you so much for playing, and I wish you a happy new year!

Controls:

 WASD / Arrow keys  - Move

 G / Left ctrl - Grab / Throw

Made by Unknown Origin for the 2019 New Years Jam!
